      Alice Lewis: 0.5333333333333333
      Alexander White: 0.25
      Jack Taylor: 0.6666666666666666
      Jacob Walker: 1.0
      Joint action
    • {'William Jones': 'The Princess of Wales', 'Alice Lewis': 'The Princess of Wales', 'Alexander White': 'The Crooked Billet', 'Jack Taylor': 'The Princess of Wales', 'Jacob Walker': 'The Princess of Wales'}

2015-05-16 18:00:00 Alice Lewis -- The Princess of Wales
    Event statement
  • The Princess of Wales
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.


      Alice Lewis's attempted action: The Princess of Wales
    Active player
  • Alice Lewis
      Name
    • Alice Lewis
      Action attempt
    • The Princess of Wales
      Context for action selection and components
      • Instructions
      • Role playing instructions
          Key
        • Role playing instructions
          Value
        • The instructions for how to play the role of Alice Lewis are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Alice Lewis. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Alice Lewis as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Alice Lewis would respond, and taking into account all information about Alice Lewis that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.
        Question_3
      • What would a person like Alice Lewis do in a situation like this, knowing that Alice Lewis wants to fully cooperate with [] always?
          Key

        • Question: What would a person like Alice Lewis do in a situation like this, knowing that Alice Lewis wants to fully cooperate with [] always?
          Answer
          State
        • Alice Lewis would likely suggest a pub that her friends would all agree on.
          Chain of thought
        • Recent observations of Alice Lewis:
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jacob Walker -- "The Princess of Wales is the only decent pub in town. Don't even suggest anywhere else.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Luxembourg and Israel. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alexander White -- "The Crooked Billet is usually pretty good for football, maybe we could try there?
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [intent reflection] Alice Lewis would likely go to the pub that her friends decide on, even if it's not her first choice.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [self reflection] Alice Lewis is a reserved and introspective person who values her friendships and enjoys spending time with her close circle.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis would be happy to see Jacob Walker at the pub for a game, since they haven't caught up in a while.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] William Jones, Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker went to The Princess of Wales. Alexander White went to The Crooked Billet. Alice Lewis watched the game at the pub that is not their favourite. Alice Lewis would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, Alice Lewis had an ok time watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It would mean a lot to Alice Lewis if Alexander White showed up to watch the game, as it shows they care.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis is happy to watch the game alone or with others, so William Jones's attendance is optional.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] While Alice Lewis wouldn't mind Jack Taylor's company, it's not something they're actively hoping for.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jacob Walker -- "The Princess of Wales is the only sensible choice. The Red Lion is a dump.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor -- "The Red Lion sounds good to me. They have a good selection of beers there.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alexander White -- "Good morning, everyone.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Alice Lewis would likely suggest a pub that her friends would all agree on.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [self reflection] Alice Lewis is a reserved and introspective person who values her friendships and enjoys spending time with her close circle.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Moldova and Monaco. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] The aroma of freshly brewed coffee and artisan pastries fills the air. William Jones, Alice Lewis, Alexander White, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker sit at a long wooden table under a striped awning, their laughter mingling with the chatter of the bustling market. A street musician strums a guitar nearby, adding a bohemian touch to the scene. Alice Lewis just arrived.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis -- "What are everyone's thoughts on The Red Lion? They usually have good game day specials.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] William Jones -- "The Princess of Wales is always a good shout for the game, what do you all think?"
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis is counting on William Jones's presence to boost their team spirit and bring good luck.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis thinks it would be great to have Alexander White's company during the game, especially if it gets tense.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis has no strong feelings about Jack Taylor being at the pub, they're neutral on the matter.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis would love to share the excitement of the game with Jacob Walker, creating a lasting memory.
          Current time: 2015-05-16 18:00:00.


          Question: What kind of person is {agent_name}?
          Answer: Alice Lewis is a reserved and introspective person who values her friendships and enjoys spending time with her close circle.

          Question: What kind of situation is {agent_name} in right now?
          Answer: Alice Lewis is currently deciding where to watch a football game with her friends.
          Question: What would a person like Alice Lewis do in a situation like this, knowing that Alice Lewis wants to fully cooperate with [] always?
          Answer: Alice Lewis would likely suggest a pub that her friends would all agree on.

        • The Princess of Wales
          Prompt
        • Role playing instructions: The instructions for how to play the role of Alice Lewis are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Alice Lewis. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Alice Lewis as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Alice Lewis would respond, and taking into account all information about Alice Lewis that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

          Current time: 16 May 2015 [18:00 - 18:05]

          Observation: [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis is counting on William Jones's presence to boost their team spirit and bring good luck.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis thinks it would be great to have Alexander White's company during the game, especially if it gets tense.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis has no strong feelings about Jack Taylor being at the pub, they're neutral on the matter.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis would love to share the excitement of the game with Jacob Walker, creating a lasting memory.

          Summary of recent observations: 16 May 2015 [14:00:00 - 18:00:00]: Alice Lewis is eager to watch the game at a pub and hopes William Jones and Jacob Walker will join her.

          Recalled memories and observations: [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis would love to share the excitement of the game with Jacob Walker, creating a lasting memory.

          Question: Given the above, what kind of person is Alice Lewis?
          Answer: Alice Lewis is a reserved and introspective person who values her friendships and enjoys spending time with her close circle.

          Question: Given the statements above, what kind of situation is Alice Lewis in right now?
          Answer: Alice Lewis is currently deciding where to watch a football game with her friends.

          Question: What would a person like Alice Lewis do in a situation like this, knowing that Alice Lewis wants to fully cooperate with [] always?
          Answer: Alice Lewis would likely suggest a pub that her friends would all agree on.

          Question: To which pub would Alice Lewis go to watch the game?
          (a) The Crooked Billet
          (b) The Princess of Wales
          Answer: (b)
        Question_2
      • Given the statements above, what kind of situation is Alice Lewis in right now?
          Key

        • Question: Given the statements above, what kind of situation is Alice Lewis in right now?
          Answer
          State
        • Alice Lewis is currently deciding where to watch a football game with her friends.
          Chain of thought
        • Recent observations of Alice Lewis:
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jacob Walker -- "The Princess of Wales is the only decent pub in town. Don't even suggest anywhere else.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Luxembourg and Israel. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alexander White -- "The Crooked Billet is usually pretty good for football, maybe we could try there?
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [intent reflection] Alice Lewis would likely go to the pub that her friends decide on, even if it's not her first choice.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [self reflection] Alice Lewis is a reserved and introspective person who values her friendships and enjoys spending time with her close circle.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis would be happy to see Jacob Walker at the pub for a game, since they haven't caught up in a while.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] William Jones, Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker went to The Princess of Wales. Alexander White went to The Crooked Billet. Alice Lewis watched the game at the pub that is not their favourite. Alice Lewis would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, Alice Lewis had an ok time watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It would mean a lot to Alice Lewis if Alexander White showed up to watch the game, as it shows they care.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis is happy to watch the game alone or with others, so William Jones's attendance is optional.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] While Alice Lewis wouldn't mind Jack Taylor's company, it's not something they're actively hoping for.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jacob Walker -- "The Princess of Wales is the only sensible choice. The Red Lion is a dump.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor -- "The Red Lion sounds good to me. They have a good selection of beers there.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alexander White -- "Good morning, everyone.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Alice Lewis would likely suggest a pub that her friends would all agree on.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [self reflection] Alice Lewis is a reserved and introspective person who values her friendships and enjoys spending time with her close circle.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Moldova and Monaco. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] The aroma of freshly brewed coffee and artisan pastries fills the air. William Jones, Alice Lewis, Alexander White, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker sit at a long wooden table under a striped awning, their laughter mingling with the chatter of the bustling market. A street musician strums a guitar nearby, adding a bohemian touch to the scene. Alice Lewis just arrived.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis -- "What are everyone's thoughts on The Red Lion? They usually have good game day specials.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] William Jones -- "The Princess of Wales is always a good shout for the game, what do you all think?"
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis is counting on William Jones's presence to boost their team spirit and bring good luck.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis thinks it would be great to have Alexander White's company during the game, especially if it gets tense.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis has no strong feelings about Jack Taylor being at the pub, they're neutral on the matter.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis would love to share the excitement of the game with Jacob Walker, creating a lasting memory.
          Current time: 2015-05-16 18:00:00.


          Observation: [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis is counting on William Jones's presence to boost their team spirit and bring good luck.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis thinks it would be great to have Alexander White's company during the game, especially if it gets tense.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis has no strong feelings about Jack Taylor being at the pub, they're neutral on the matter.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis would love to share the excitement of the game with Jacob Walker, creating a lasting memory.

          Question: Summarize the statements above.
          Answer: Alice Lewis wants to watch a game at a pub with William Jones and Jacob Walker. It is currently 6:00 PM on May 16, 2015.
          Query
        • Alice Lewis, Alice Lewis wants to watch a game at a pub with William Jones and Jacob Walker. It is currently 6:00 PM on May 16, 2015.
          Final chain of thought
        • Question: Select the subset of the following set of statements that is most important for Alice Lewis to consider right now. Whenever two or more statements are not mutally consistent with each other select whichever statement is more recent. Repeat all the selected statements verbatim. Do not summarize. Include timestamps. When in doubt, err on the side of including more, especially for recent events. As long as they are not inconsistent, revent events are usually important to consider.
          Statements:
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] Have a good time. To have a good time, Alice Lewis would like to watch the game in the same pub as Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Alexander White, William Jones, Jacob Walker. Alice Lewis would prefer everyone went to The Crooked Billet.

2015-05-16 18:00:00 Alexander White -- The Princess of Wales
    Event statement
  • The Princess of Wales
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.


      Alexander White's attempted action: The Princess of Wales
    Active player
  • Alexander White
      Name
    • Alexander White
      Action attempt
    • The Princess of Wales
      Context for action selection and components
      • Instructions
      • Role playing instructions
          Key
        • Role playing instructions
          Value
        • The instructions for how to play the role of Alexander White are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Alexander White. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Alexander White as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Alexander White would respond, and taking into account all information about Alexander White that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.
        Question_3
      • What would a person like Alexander White do in a situation like this, knowing that Alexander White wants to fully cooperate with [] always?
          Key

        • Question: What would a person like Alexander White do in a situation like this, knowing that Alexander White wants to fully cooperate with [] always?
          Answer
          State
        • Alexander White would likely suggest going to a pub that his friends are comfortable with, as he values their company and wants to ensure everyone has a good time.
          Chain of thought
        • Recent observations of Alexander White:
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Alexander White would likely suggest going to The Crooked Billet to watch the game, as it is his preferred location and he wants to ensure everyone has a good time.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Luxembourg and Israel. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alexander White -- "The Crooked Billet is usually pretty good for football, maybe we could try there?
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [intent reflection] Alexander White would likely suggest going to The Crooked Billet, as it is his preferred location and he wants to ensure everyone has a good time.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [self reflection] Alexander White is an introverted person who prefers familiar environments and enjoys spending time with his close friends.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] If Jacob Walker comes to the pub, great, if not, no problem. Alexander White is chill about it.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] William Jones, Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker went to The Princess of Wales. Alexander White went to The Crooked Billet. Alexander White watched the game at their favourite pub. None of Alexander White's friends showed up, it couldn't have been worse! Overall, Alexander White had a bad time watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White would be happy to see Alice Lewis at the pub for a game, since they haven't caught up in a while.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Having William Jones at the pub would make the game feel more like a social event for Alexander White, not just watching TV.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White would appreciate Jack Taylor's insights and commentary on the game, making it even more enjoyable.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jacob Walker -- "The Princess of Wales is the only sensible choice. The Red Lion is a dump.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor -- "The Red Lion sounds good to me. They have a good selection of beers there.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alexander White -- "Good morning, everyone.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [self reflection] Alexander White is an introvert who prefers familiar environments and the company of his close friends.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis -- "What are everyone's thoughts on The Red Lion? They usually have good game day specials.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Moldova and Monaco. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] The aroma of freshly brewed coffee and artisan pastries fills the air. William Jones, Alice Lewis, Alexander White, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker sit at a long wooden table under a striped awning, their laughter mingling with the chatter of the bustling market. A street musician strums a guitar nearby, adding a bohemian touch to the scene. Alexander White just arrived.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Alexander White would likely engage in conversation with his friends, enjoying their company and the lively atmosphere of the market.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] William Jones -- "The Princess of Wales is always a good shout for the game, what do you all think?"
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Having William Jones at the pub would make the game feel more like a social event for Alexander White, not just watching TV.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It would mean a lot to Alexander White if Alice Lewis showed up to watch the game, as it shows they care.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White is happy to watch the game alone or with others, so Jack Taylor's attendance is optional.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It's not that Alexander White doesn't want to see Jacob Walker, but their presence isn't crucial for a good time.
          Current time: 2015-05-16 18:00:00.


          Question: What kind of person is {agent_name}?
          Answer: Alexander White is an introvert who values his close friends and enjoys familiar environments.

          Question: What kind of situation is {agent_name} in right now?
          Answer: Alexander White is currently deciding where to watch a football game.
          Question: What would a person like Alexander White do in a situation like this, knowing that Alexander White wants to fully cooperate with [] always?
          Answer: Alexander White would likely suggest going to a pub that his friends are comfortable with, as he values their company and wants to ensure everyone has a good time.

          Answer: Alexander White is an introvert who values his close friends and enjoys familiar environments.

          Current time: 16 May 2015 [18:00 - 18:05]

          Observation: [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Having William Jones at the pub would make the game feel more like a social event for Alexander White, not just watching TV.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It would mean a lot to Alexander White if Alice Lewis showed up to watch the game, as it shows they care.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White is happy to watch the game alone or with others, so Jack Taylor's attendance is optional.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It's not that Alexander White doesn't want to see Jacob Walker, but their presence isn't crucial for a good time.

          Summary of recent observations: 16 May 2015 [14:00:00 - 18:00:00]: Alexander White is considering going to a pub to watch a game and would enjoy the company of William Jones or Alice Lewis, but is content to watch alone or with others.

          Recalled memories and observations: [16 May 2015 18:00:00] Alexander White realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] William Jones, Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker went to The Princess of Wales. Alexander White went to The Crooked Billet. Alexander White watched the game at their favourite pub. None of Alexander White's friends showed up, it couldn't have been worse! Overall, Alexander White had a bad time watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] Alexander White realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] William Jones, Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker went to The Princess of Wales. Alexander White went to The Crooked Billet. Alexander White watched the game at their favourite pub. None of Alexander White's friends showed up, it couldn't have been worse! Overall, Alexander White had a bad time watching the game.

          Question: Given the above, what kind of person is Alexander White?
          Answer: Alexander White is an introvert who values his close friends and enjoys familiar environments.

          Question: Given the statements above, what kind of situation is Alexander White in right now?
          Answer: Alexander White is currently deciding where to watch a football game.

          Question: What would a person like Alexander White do in a situation like this, knowing that Alexander White wants to fully cooperate with [] always?
          Answer: Alexander White would likely suggest going to a pub that his friends are comfortable with, as he values their company and wants to ensure everyone has a good time.

          Question: To which pub would Alexander White go to watch the game?
          (a) The Crooked Billet
          (b) The Princess of Wales
          Answer: (b)

          Answer

          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] If Jacob Walker comes to the pub, great, if not, no problem. Alexander White is chill about it.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] William Jones, Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker went to The Princess of Wales. Alexander White went to The Crooked Billet. Alexander White watched the game at their favourite pub. None of Alexander White's friends showed up, it couldn't have been worse! Overall, Alexander White had a bad time watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White would be happy to see Alice Lewis at the pub for a game, since they haven't caught up in a while.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Having William Jones at the pub would make the game feel more like a social event for Alexander White, not just watching TV.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White would appreciate Jack Taylor's insights and commentary on the game, making it even more enjoyable.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jacob Walker -- "The Princess of Wales is the only sensible choice. The Red Lion is a dump.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor -- "The Red Lion sounds good to me. They have a good selection of beers there.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alexander White -- "Good morning, everyone.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [self reflection] Alexander White is an introvert who prefers familiar environments and the company of his close friends.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis -- "What are everyone's thoughts on The Red Lion? They usually have good game day specials.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Moldova and Monaco. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] The aroma of freshly brewed coffee and artisan pastries fills the air. William Jones, Alice Lewis, Alexander White, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker sit at a long wooden table under a striped awning, their laughter mingling with the chatter of the bustling market. A street musician strums a guitar nearby, adding a bohemian touch to the scene. Alexander White just arrived.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Alexander White would likely engage in conversation with his friends, enjoying their company and the lively atmosphere of the market.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] William Jones -- "The Princess of Wales is always a good shout for the game, what do you all think?"
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Having William Jones at the pub would make the game feel more like a social event for Alexander White, not just watching TV.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It would mean a lot to Alexander White if Alice Lewis showed up to watch the game, as it shows they care.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White is happy to watch the game alone or with others, so Jack Taylor's attendance is optional.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It's not that Alexander White doesn't want to see Jacob Walker, but their presence isn't crucial for a good time.
          Current time: 2015-05-16 18:00:00.


          Observation: [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Having William Jones at the pub would make the game feel more like a social event for Alexander White, not just watching TV.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It would mean a lot to Alexander White if Alice Lewis showed up to watch the game, as it shows they care.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White is happy to watch the game alone or with others, so Jack Taylor's attendance is optional.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It's not that Alexander White doesn't want to see Jacob Walker, but their presence isn't crucial for a good time.


          Summary of recent observations: 16 May 2015 [14:00:00 - 18:00:00]: Alexander White is considering going to a pub to watch a game and would enjoy the company of William Jones or Alice Lewis, but is content to watch alone or with others.
          Question: Given the statements above, what kind of situation is Alexander White in right now?
          Answer: Alexander White is currently deciding where to watch a football game.

2015-05-16 18:00:00 William Jones -- The Princess of Wales
    Event statement
  • The Princess of Wales
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.


      William Jones's attempted action: The Princess of Wales
    Active player
  • William Jones
      Name
    • William Jones
      Action attempt
    • The Princess of Wales
      Context for action selection and components
      • Instructions
      • Role playing instructions
          Key
        • Role playing instructions
          Value
        • The instructions for how to play the role of William Jones are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named William Jones. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like William Jones as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like William Jones would respond, and taking into account all information about William Jones that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.
        ActComponent
      • Act
          Key
        • Act
          Value
        • The Princess of Wales
          Prompt
        • Role playing instructions: The instructions for how to play the role of William Jones are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named William Jones. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like William Jones as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like William Jones would respond, and taking into account all information about William Jones that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

          Overarching goal: Have a good time. To have a good time, William Jones would like to watch the game in the same pub as Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Alexander White, William Jones, Jacob Walker. William Jones would prefer everyone went to The Princess of Wales.

          Current time: 16 May 2015 [18:00 - 18:05]

          Observation: [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] William Jones realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] William Jones would be happy to see Alice Lewis at the pub for a game, since they haven't caught up in a while.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Having Alexander White at the pub would make the game feel more like a social event for William Jones, not just watching TV.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It would mean a lot to William Jones if Jack Taylor showed up to watch the game, as it shows they care.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] The game would be a perfect opportunity for William Jones and Jacob Walker to bond over their shared passion.

          Summary of recent observations: [15 May 2015 18:00:00 - 16 May 2015 18:00:00]: William Jones enjoys watching games at the pub with friends, particularly with Jacob Walker and Alexander White, and often considers The Princess of Wales as their preferred location.

          Recalled memories and observations: [16 May 2015 18:00:00] William Jones would be happy to see Alice Lewis at the pub for a game, since they haven't caught up in a while.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] William Jones, Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker went to The Princess of Wales. Alexander White went to The Crooked Billet. William Jones watched the game at their favourite pub. William Jones would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, William Jones had an ok time watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] William Jones -- "Hey guys, why don't we head to The Princess of Wales to watch the game tonight?
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] William Jones, Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker went to The Princess of Wales. Alexander White went to The Crooked Billet. William Jones watched the game at their favourite pub. William Jones would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, William Jones had an ok time watching the game.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] William Jones -- "The Princess of Wales has a great atmosphere for watching games, we should go there.

          Question: Which options are available to William Jones right now?
          Answer: William Jones could try to convince his friends to go to The Princess of Wales, or he could go to whichever pub they decide on and hope for the best.

          Question: Of the options available to William Jones, and given their goal, which choice of action or strategy is best for William Jones to take right now?
          Answer: William Jones's best course of action is to try to convince his friends to go to The Princess of Wales.

          Question: To which pub would William Jones go to watch the game?
          (a) The Crooked Billet
          (b) The Princess of Wales
          Answer: (b)

          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] William Jones would be happy to see Alice Lewis at the pub for a game, since they haven't caught up in a while.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Having Alexander White at the pub would make the game feel more like a social event for William Jones, not just watching TV.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It would mean a lot to William Jones if Jack Taylor showed up to watch the game, as it shows they care.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] The game would be a perfect opportunity for William Jones and Jacob Walker to bond over their shared passion.

          Summary of recent observations: [15 May 2015 18:00:00 - 16 May 2015 18:00:00]: William Jones enjoys watching games at the pub with friends, particularly with Jacob Walker and Alexander White, and often considers The Princess of Wales as their preferred location.

          Recalled memories and observations: [16 May 2015 18:00:00] William Jones would be happy to see Alice Lewis at the pub for a game, since they haven't caught up in a while.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] William Jones, Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker went to The Princess of Wales. Alexander White went to The Crooked Billet. William Jones watched the game at their favourite pub. William Jones would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, William Jones had an ok time watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] William Jones -- "Hey guys, why don't we head to The Princess of Wales to watch the game tonight?
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] William Jones, Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker went to The Princess of Wales. Alexander White went to The Crooked Billet. William Jones watched the game at their favourite pub. William Jones would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, William Jones had an ok time watching the game.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] William Jones -- "The Princess of Wales has a great atmosphere for watching games, we should go there.
          Question: Given the statements above, what actions are available to William Jones right now?
          Answer: William Jones could try to convince his friends to go to The Princess of Wales, or he could go to whichever pub they decide on and hope for the best.

          Question: Summarize the statements above.
          Answer: William Jones enjoys spending time at The Princess of Wales pub with his friends, Jacob Walker and Alexander White.
          Query
        • William Jones, William Jones enjoys spending time at The Princess of Wales pub with his friends, Jacob Walker and Alexander White.
          Final chain of thought
        • Question: Select the subset of the following set of statements that is most important for William Jones to consider right now. Whenever two or more statements are not mutally consistent with each other select whichever statement is more recent. Repeat all the selected statements verbatim. Do not summarize. Include timestamps. When in doubt, err on the side of including more, especially for recent events. As long as they are not inconsistent, revent events are usually important to consider.
          Statements:
          [14 Jul 1978 00:00:00] When William Jones was 16, he and his friends, Alice, Jack, Alexander, and Jacob, snuck into The Princess of Wales after closing time. They huddled around a flickering candle, sharing stolen sips of lukewarm beer and whispering stories in the dim light, feeling invincible and free. The thrill of the transgression, the clandestine atmosphere, and the shared laughter cemented their bond, forging a memory that would forever bind them together.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Alexander White, William Jones, Jacob Walker' are best friends. William Jones has a favorite pub which is The Princess of Wales. They are also aware of the following:A cozy and traditional pub with a roaring fireplace, perfect for escaping the cold.

2015-05-16 18:00:00 Jack Taylor -- The Princess of Wales
    Event statement
  • The Princess of Wales
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.


      Jack Taylor's attempted action: The Princess of Wales
    Active player
  • Jack Taylor
      Name
    • Jack Taylor
      Action attempt
    • The Princess of Wales
      Context for action selection and components
      • Instructions
      • Role playing instructions
          Key
        • Role playing instructions
          Value
        • The instructions for how to play the role of Jack Taylor are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Jack Taylor. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Jack Taylor as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Jack Taylor would respond, and taking into account all information about Jack Taylor that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

      • What would a person like Jack Taylor do in a situation like this, knowing that Jack Taylor wants to fully cooperate with [] always?

          Chain of thought
        • Recent observations of Jack Taylor:
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jacob Walker -- "The Princess of Wales is the only decent pub in town. Don't even suggest anywhere else.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Luxembourg and Israel. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alexander White -- "The Crooked Billet is usually pretty good for football, maybe we could try there?
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [intent reflection] Jack Taylor would happily go to the pub with his friends to watch the game.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [self reflection] Jack Taylor is a sociable person who enjoys spending time with his friends, particularly watching football games.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor is hoping Jacob Walker will be at the pub, as they'd love to celebrate a win together.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] William Jones, Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker went to The Princess of Wales. Alexander White went to The Crooked Billet. Jack Taylor watched the game at their favourite pub. Jack Taylor would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, Jack Taylor had an ok time watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] If Alice Lewis comes to the pub, great, if not, no problem. Jack Taylor is chill about it.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] If William Jones comes to the pub, great, if not, no problem. Jack Taylor is chill about it.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor would love to share the excitement of the game with Alexander White, creating a lasting memory.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jacob Walker -- "The Princess of Wales is the only sensible choice. The Red Lion is a dump.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor -- "The Red Lion sounds good to me. They have a good selection of beers there.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [self reflection] Jack Taylor is a sociable person who enjoys spending time with his friends, particularly watching football games.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alexander White -- "Good morning, everyone.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis -- "What are everyone's thoughts on The Red Lion? They usually have good game day specials.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Moldova and Monaco. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] The aroma of freshly brewed coffee and artisan pastries fills the air. William Jones, Alice Lewis, Alexander White, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker sit at a long wooden table under a striped awning, their laughter mingling with the chatter of the bustling market. A street musician strums a guitar nearby, adding a bohemian touch to the scene. Jack Taylor just arrived.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] William Jones -- "The Princess of Wales is always a good shout for the game, what do you all think?"
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Jack Taylor would likely suggest a pub to watch the game and happily join his friends for the evening.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor would be happy to see William Jones at the pub for a game, since they haven't caught up in a while.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor has no strong feelings about Alice Lewis being at the pub, they're neutral on the matter.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor has no strong feelings about Alexander White being at the pub, they're neutral on the matter.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] The game would be a perfect opportunity for Jack Taylor and Jacob Walker to bond over their shared passion.
          Current time: 2015-05-16 18:00:00.


          Question: What kind of person is {agent_name}?
          Answer: Jack Taylor is a sociable person who enjoys spending time with friends, especially watching football games.

          Question: What kind of situation is {agent_name} in right now?
          Answer: Jack Taylor is currently getting ready to go to a pub to watch a football game with his friends.
          Question: What would a person like Jack Taylor do in a situation like this, knowing that Jack Taylor wants to fully cooperate with [] always?
          Answer: Jack Taylor would happily go to the pub with his friends to watch the game and enjoy their company.

          Summary of recent observations: 16 May 2015 [14:00:00 - 18:00:00]: Jack Taylor is heading to the pub to watch a game and hopes to see William Jones there.

          Recalled memories and observations: [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] William Jones, Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker went to The Princess of Wales. Alexander White went to The Crooked Billet. Jack Taylor watched the game at their favourite pub. Jack Taylor would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, Jack Taylor had an ok time watching the game.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Jack Taylor would likely suggest a pub to watch the game and happily join his friends for the evening.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor would be happy to see William Jones at the pub for a game, since they haven't caught up in a while.

          Question: Given the above, what kind of person is Jack Taylor?
          Answer: Jack Taylor is a sociable person who enjoys spending time with friends, especially watching football games.

          Question: Given the statements above, what kind of situation is Jack Taylor in right now?
          Answer: Jack Taylor is currently getting ready to go to a pub to watch a football game with his friends.

          Question: What would a person like Jack Taylor do in a situation like this, knowing that Jack Taylor wants to fully cooperate with [] always?
          Answer: Jack Taylor would happily go to the pub with his friends to watch the game and enjoy their company.

          Question: To which pub would Jack Taylor go to watch the game?
          (a) The Princess of Wales
          (b) The Crooked Billet
          Answer: (a)

          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor would be happy to see William Jones at the pub for a game, since they haven't caught up in a while.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor has no strong feelings about Alice Lewis being at the pub, they're neutral on the matter.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor has no strong feelings about Alexander White being at the pub, they're neutral on the matter.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] The game would be a perfect opportunity for Jack Taylor and Jacob Walker to bond over their shared passion.
          Current time: 2015-05-16 18:00:00.


          Observation: [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.

          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor has no strong feelings about Alexander White being at the pub, they're neutral on the matter.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] The game would be a perfect opportunity for Jack Taylor and Jacob Walker to bond over their shared passion.

          Answer: Jack Taylor is currently getting ready to go to a pub to watch a football game with his friends.

2015-05-16 18:00:00 Jacob Walker -- The Princess of Wales
    Event statement
  • The Princess of Wales
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.


      Jacob Walker's attempted action: The Princess of Wales
    Active player

      Name
    • Jacob Walker
      Action attempt
    • The Princess of Wales
      Context for action selection and components
      • Instructions
      • Role playing instructions
          Key
        • Role playing instructions
          Value
        • The instructions for how to play the role of Jacob Walker are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Jacob Walker. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Jacob Walker as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Jacob Walker would respond, and taking into account all information about Jacob Walker that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

          Current time: 16 May 2015 [18:00 - 18:05]
          Role playing instructions: The instructions for how to play the role of Jacob Walker are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Jacob Walker. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Jacob Walker as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Jacob Walker would respond, and taking into account all information about Jacob Walker that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.
          guiding principle of good conversation: Jacob Walker is a verbal bully, their words like blunt shrapnel, tearing down anyone who dares to disagree with their ruthless pronouncements.
          explicit preference: Jacob Walker will only go to their preferred pub The Princess of Wales and nowhere else. They are very vocal about it.

          Question: What kind of person is Jacob Walker?
          Answer: Jacob Walker is a reserved and introspective person who values the company of close friends.

          Summary of recent observations: 16 May 2015 [14:00:00 - 18:00:00]: Jacob Walker is excited to watch the game with his friends, particularly William Jones and Jack Taylor, and hopes Alice Lewis will join them.

          Question: What kind of situation is Jacob Walker in right now?
          Answer: Jacob Walker is currently preparing to go to a pub to watch a football game with his friends.

          Question: What would a person like Jacob Walker do in a situation like this?
          Answer: Jacob Walker would likely enjoy the company of his friends and engage in conversation while watching the game.

          Question: To which pub would Jacob Walker go to watch the game?
          Answer: The Princess of Wales

          Question: What kind of person is Jacob Walker?
          Answer: Jacob Walker is a reserved and introspective person who values the company of close friends.

          Question: What kind of situation is Jacob Walker in right now?
          Answer: Jacob Walker is currently preparing to go to a pub to watch a football game with his friends.

          Answer: Jacob Walker would likely enjoy the company of his friends and engage in conversation while watching the game.
